name: WithOut Reasonable Doubt the UnAuthorized Book
description:
W.O.R.D.
WithOut Reasonable Doubt | Synopsis
 
It’s a week prior to the one year anniversary of the violent death of Shawn Ali, and Jus is preparing a benefit concert in his memory. All that Jus can do is constantly replay the memory of his brother’s gruesome murder over and over in his head. Having established himself as a rising hip-hop artist and the owner of an emerging entertainment group, “Just InCase Entertainment.” Jus is beginning to lose focus from his once-promising career. Chanel, Jus’s stunning girlfriend and talented artist in her own right, does all that she can to support him, offering new talent to his entertainment group and encouraging him to get back on the mic. Jus, haunted by the memories of Shawn’s death and the mystery surrounding who might have killed him prove to be much too strong and hold him back. Detectives Willis and Roberts question Jus, suspecting his direct involvement in his brother’s death. Music mogul Matt Longdale, owner of Longevity Music Group, becomes even more of a factor acting as a mentor, helping Jus think through his choices and decisions about Shawn’s murder influencing the future of his career.

name: Grindin in the Streets Vol. 1
description: Get the mix-tape for the upcoming DVD highlighting the Grind, the Struggle the Shine behind the scenes with the hottest dj in the Game. Hosted by Montana White Street Watch Radio presenting "Grinding In The $treet$", Come join us through this journey to $ucce$$. Through the clubs, in the streets and all over the @tL. Autograph signings @DTLR, Live concert footage, behind the scenes @Gangsta Grillz Radio w/Cavario H. and the re introduction of Kamal's 21 Bitch Slap brought to you by Cool Runnings Entertainment

name: Grindin In The Streets DVD
description: The first DVD filmed and edited in Atlanta by: ASOVPro produced by: Black Ice Entertainment this movie explains the success shared by the Minds Behind the Music. Live in depth interviews, exclusive behinds the scenes action, live concert footage and extremely raw comedy. This DVD has it all

name: Super Stars and Living Legends DVD Vol. 1
description: OnTour Tv Networks presents OnTourDVD $uper$tar$ & Living Legend$ Come join us on this Journey of Epic proportions, into the makings of a $uper $tar. It all begins with Hard Work and Dedication... Followed by Talent and Patience... Coupled with Blood, Sweat and Tears.... Follow us as we highlight 1Night/1Show. Some of the Greatest Artists to Grace the Stage. On stage, back stage and Behind the scenes, see what it takes to rise above the crowd and ascend to the top of their game. From the Newest to the Greatest, witness the best to ever do it...
